name: Hearthlight Eve
description:
Delacroix returns for the holidays after a long time away.  Contains bad parenting and sadness.

This is a teaser tie-in for Crème de la Crème, an in-progress Choice of Games project about aristocrats at finishing school. Patrice Delacroix is a side-character in Crème de la Crème. Find more content, discussion and feedback on the Developer Diary thread on the Choice of Games forums!
